title: From Honor 0 to Honor 2 !
body:
Took me 2 and a half months but I finally made it back to H2(from 0) on my main! 
The system is so effective that I don't even cuss anymore Lmao. 
It's really not that hard, all I did was encourage my teammates to do well and I got a checkpoint every week . Also, don't respond to flamers > Just mute as soon as they start being negative . 
GG {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

replies.body:
I played 3-5 games daily and ALWAYS Honored someone after the game. 
Yes I do use chat, but only to be nice(I type GL HF & GG WP every game). You prob won't believe me but I haven't said a SINGLE curse word after being punished(I was that scared of getting Perma'd).
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
How long did it take to go from 1 to 2? I'm at 1 (just hit it today)....I got chat banned back in August.... :\ I don't think I'll make it for rewards/level 2

From H1 to H2 = A month or so, took me 7-9 days for each checkpoint.
I know someone who got a checkpoint every 2 weeks which isn't ideal for your situation since we only got a month left before the season ends, but I'm hopeful that you can make it, Good Luck.
That's great!  Glad to see your progress, guy.  Proud of you.
Thank you {{sticker:galio-happy}}
this gave me hope as im 2 checkpoints away from honor 2 again
You can do it, I believe in you.
Congrats, man. Glad to see you've worked your way back up! Keep rallying your teammates, and best of luck out on the Rift.
Thank You !
Been stuck at honor 3 since the beginning of the season with 0 check points. I was honor 5 last season... tell me what im doing wrong that this broken system hasn't given me anything...

> [{quoted}](name=Aurelion Söl,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=hpeJjwrb,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2018-09-23T02:39:25.111+0000)
>
> Been stuck at honor 3 since the beginning of the season with 0 check points. I was honor 5 last season... tell me what im doing wrong that this broken system hasn't given me anything...

Honor is meant to be a season long thing. Last season the new system rolled out late so riot let people gain honor very quickly to compensate.

This season we don't hav that helping hand. So if you avoid getting reported you should steadily climb. If it took OP about 2.5 months to climb 2 tiers then it should take about the same to hit honor 5.

I can't control people reporting me for feeding when I didn't try to... that's what the system doesn't account for the human aspect of things. It's all automated and maybe 1/50 reports is actually reviewed by a riot member. So the fact that im still honor 3 because kids like to report every little thing they don't like in the game im stuck here.

Far as I know > Only "Valid Reports" count, meaning you can't get punished for being bad.
Trust me, I've had 0/15 games trying "off-meta" builds with people threatening to kill me and it never affected my progress Lol. Just Mute?
I'm looking through these comments and im wondering how can you not climb in honor or even lose honor what do you have to do?

Simple . 
Reach Masters > Miss a Skillshot > Get killed twice  > Then try to "Defend" yourself  from people calling you names the rest of the game. {{sticker:galio-happy}}
what will happen if i play aram for 20 matches per day how long do u think im gonna get to honor lvl 2? im at 0 1 check point rn.i get least 1 honor every game

Hey! I know this is a really late comment but I had a question, you said that you played 3-5 games 'daily' is this just a rough estimate? or did you actually play that much? Currently, I've got 3months to get back to honour lvl 2 :c I'm wondering If I have to play that much. Also, did you get honoured a lot? or does honours not really matter? Thanks!
It took me 92 days to get back to honor 2 with 8-10 games a day. honored my team mates every game to try and get the honor boost for everyone honoring each other

> [{quoted}](name=ScottMurall,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=hpeJjwrb,comment-id=,timestamp=2018-09-22T23:55:56.792+0000)
>
> Took me 2 and a half months but I finally made it back to H2(from 0) on my main! 
> The system is so effective that I don&#039;t even cuss anymore Lmao. 
> It&#039;s really not that hard, all I did was encourage my teammates to do well and I got a checkpoint every week . Also, don&#039;t respond to flamers &gt; Just mute as soon as they start being negative . 
> GG {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

Im honor lvl 1 Checkpoint 1, do you think i can reach honor lvl 2 before the season ends? im playing minimum 5 games a day
GG's im still waiting for my checkpoint ._.  RITO gimme honor 2 before season ends, Imma good boy now :')

Awesome dude, keep it up!
{{sticker:sg-lux}}
Thank You ! :)
lol

Good for you mate. I have been grinding that honor progression from lvl 0 to 2 as long as I remember (could be 8 months lol) and made it to 3rd checkpoint of lvl1 so I dont know if some cases are worse than others or maybe because I only play 2-3 games a day 
it would be nice if there a progress bar instead of these checkpoints
Yea, could be that you don't play enough and I agree with something like a progress bar to show us how close we are to our next goal.
I'm still at like checkpoint 2 of honor lvl 3 lmao.
i got my first check point.
ok lets see how bs this system is. imma do the exact same thing, bet you it will take more than 2 and half months.

It really shouldn't.

There are people who've gottwn honor 3 in  2 months after their punishment.

> [{quoted}](name=Akali Prime,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=hpeJjwrb,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2018-09-23T02:33:55.192+0000)
>
> ok lets see how bs this system is. imma do the exact same thing, bet you it will take more than 2 and half months.

So, how long did it take you Akali Prime?
